requirement.description: The LOGOS plug-in shall allow support for user-defined analysis flow using RAVEN on capital budgeting problems.
The LOGOS shall allow support for stand-alone analysis on capital budgeting problems.
LOGOS shall be able to perform Single Knapsack deterministic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multiple Knapsack deterministic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multi-choice Knapsack deterministic capital budgeting optimization

requirement_set.caption: Stochastic Anlysis of Deterministic Capital Budgeting Optimization

requirement.description: LOGOS plugin shall be able to perform stochastic analysis of Single Knapsack deterministic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS plugin shall be able to perform stochastic analysis of Multiple Knapsack deterministic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS plugin shall be able to perform stochastic analysis of Multi-choice Knapsack deterministic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Single Knapsack Stochastic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multiple Knapsack Stochastic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multi-Choice Knapsack Stochastic capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Single Knapsack Distributionally Robust capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multiple Knapsack Distributionally Robust capital budgeting optimization
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multi-Choice Knapsack Distributionally Robust capital budgeting optimization

requirement_set.caption: Stochastic Capital Budgeting Optimization Based Conditional Value-at-Risk

requirement.description: LOGOS shall be able to perform Single Knapsack Stochastic capital budgeting optimization based Conditional Value-at-Risk
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multiple Knapsack Stochastic capital budgeting optimization based Conditional Value-at-Risk
LOGOS shall be able to perform Multi-Choice Knapsack Stochastic capital budgeting optimization based Conditional Value-at-Risk
